lines.text: create long long integers ans , x , y , x1 , y1
lines.code: long long int ans , x , y , x1 , y1 ;

lines.text: read x read y read x1 read y1
set ans to maximum of absolute value of ( x - x1 ) and absolute value of ( y - y1 )
lines.code: ans = max ( abs ( x - x1 ) , abs ( y - y1 ) ) ;

mod_code: ans = max ( abs ( x - x1 ) and abs ( y - y1 ) ) ;
